  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eun</catalog>
            <entry>14821</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="it">Wequest  su inventori ed invenzioni</string>
            <string language="en">Wequest qbout inventors and inventions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wequest qbout Erfinder und Erfindungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Inventeurs et inventions de qbout de Wequest</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inventores e invenções do qbout de Wequest</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εφευρέτες και εφευρέσεις Wequest qbout</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Inventores e invenciones del qbout de Wequest</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Questo è un webquest per imparare su inventori ed  invenzioni in Europa attraverso le risorse di Internet. Gli allievi sono guidati mediante link per imparare sull'argomento e per preparare la loro  presentazione sul tema.</string>
            <string language="en">This is a webquest to learn about inventors and inventions in Europe through internet resources. Students are guided throug given links to learn about the topic and to prepare their own presentation on the topic.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">inventori</string>
            <string language="en">inventors</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">invenzioni</string>
            <string language="en">inventions</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist, zum über Erfinder und Erfindungen in 
Europa durch Internet Informationsquellen zu erlernen ein webquest. 
Kursteilnehmer sind die geführten throug gegebenen Links, zum 
über das Thema zu erlernen und ihrer eigenen Darstellung auf dem 
Thema vorzubereiten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est un webquest à se renseigner sur des 
inventeurs et des inventions en Europe par des ressources d'Internet. 
Les étudiants sont des liens donnés par throug guidés à se 
renseigner sur le sujet et pour préparer leur propre présentation 
sur le sujet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este é um o mais webquest a aprender sobre 
inventores e invenções em Europa através dos recursos de Internet. 
Os estudantes são ligações dadas throug guiadas a aprender 
sobre o tópico e para preparar sua própria apresentação no 
tópico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι ένα pjo' ωεψquεστ για να μάθει για τους 
εφευρέτες και τις εφευρέσεις στην Ευρώπη μέσω των στοιχείων 
συμπεριφοράς Διαδικτύου. Οι σπουδαστές είναι καθοδηγημένες 
throug δεδομένες συνδέσεις που μαθαίνουν για το θέμα και που 
προετοιμάζουν την παρουσίασή τους για το θέμα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Éste es un el ma's webquest a aprender sobre 
inventores e invenciones en Europa a través de recursos de Internet. 
Los estudiantes son conexiones dadas throug dirigidas a aprender
sobre el asunto y para preparar su propia presentación en el asunto.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erfinder</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erfindungen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">inventeurs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">inventions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">inventores</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">invenções</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εφευρέτες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εφευρέσεις</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">inventores</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">invenciones</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

          <description>
            <string language="it">Si tratta di semplice webquest che può essere usata in qualsiasi classe per l'inglese. Le istruzioni sono brevi e semplici e tutto ciò che occorre è dato come risorsa. Alla fine ci sono fogli di verifica per l'autovalutazione degli studenti.</string>
            <string language="en">This webquest is simple and can bu used in any classes that can use English. The instructions are simle and short and all the necesary handouts are given as resource. At the end there are evaluation sheets for students selfevaluation.</string>
          </description>
        </educational>
